column4: i am looking for someone who is here regularly, very knowledgeable in unix commands, variations of unix / linux based OSs, that can help someone like me who knows nothing about it. ...
i have been a windows user since 1996
i just bought a laptop with Windows 8 , aka Windows 7 RT aka Vista 8, i want to dump windows after this Windows 8 infringement on the User Friendly user.
You want to drop Windows, what do you want to do with vbox then?
i have several older copies of Ubuntu on cd back in new york, where all my software, backup and 99% of my items are
You dont need vbox for inserting a CD and just copy your data back.
Just insert the Ubuntu installation cd, reboot from CD, and follow the instructions on screen.
is there a URL in which to download to a directory ?
You will have to reformat it when using it as an installation media.
Dont you have a CD/DVD drive in your laptop?
Just download an Ubuntu CD and burn it with one of the zillion burning applications in windows.
And Vista/Win7 work pretty fine when dualbooting.
Windows 8 gives a return of 7 when typing //say $os , it is Windows 7 RT aka Windows 8 but people are calling it Vista 8 because of the bad reputation of Vista OS and how Win 8 is as buggy as Vista
I dontcare how peoplecall it. I just know dual booting works up to Windows 2012.
And just click on "Download" on http://www.ubuntu.com
Then take a look at the bill.
